BCES Global

Project Scope

— Logo
— Stationery

In 2020, I started Mel’s Design Shop as a side project. I wanted to create for myself after the 9 to 5. It’s also a great opportunity to develop other skills like photography, packaging and product design. Since then, I’ve designed over 30 greeting cards, many cheeky stickers, fun prints & more!
